pages.text: Banish the darkness. The Ritual of Sol automatically places light sources in dark areas, preventing mob spawns and illuminating your surroundings. Place light-emitting blocks in a chest above the ritual.

pages.title: Costs & Details
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$() 1000 LP$(br)$(bold)Refresh:$() 1 LP per block placed$(br)$(bold)Refresh Time:$() 5 ticks$(br2)$(bold)Effect Range:$() 65x65x65 blocks (configurable)$(br)$(bold)Chest:$() 1 block above ritual$(br2)Places blocks from the chest in dark spots (light level < 8) that have solid ground below.

pages.title: Blood Light Synergy
pages.text: $(bold)Special Feature:$()$(br)If you place Blood Magic's $(item)Sigil of Blood Light$() in the chest, the ritual will place Blood Lights $(bold)without consuming the sigil$()!$(br2)This allows for infinite blood light placement using only LP.$(br2)$(italic)Let there be light!$()
